---
title: "Data Import"
output: github_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data!!

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

update the names in 'litters_df'. this will clean up the names so remove capital letters and take away spaces.

```{r}
litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data

```{r}
litters_df
```


Sometimes skimming data is neat?

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Fix the missingness

```{r}
litters_df
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""), skip=5)
```

Importing another dataset (on my own)
```{r}
pups_df = 
  read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv",
           skip = 3, 
           na = c("NA", ".", "")
           )
pups_df =
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
